name: Fortress in the sky 2 design document
name_original: Fortress in the sky 2 design document
description:
The game will be a 3D sequel to an older 2D game of mine. 

Fortress in the Sky Trailer

The game will be a 3D platformer where you fight off cute monsters with magic spells and do parkours along the way.

https://daydreamstudio.itch.io/fortress-in-the-sky
